complaint.description: I've been on the phone for 25 minutes waiting to speak to a consultant. I have 1.5gig data which I can not use. I had to load a chat bundle to be able to post this. They are useless. I've requested several call backs but nothing happens. Telkom customer pay through their ears for a useless service. Can someone please wake them up to give better customer service. I do not wish to use a robot service but to speak to an actual person to sort out why I can't use my data. Have they even looked at why their call volumes are so high? Because of useless service. Some people give up eventually holding the line. Do better. You aren't Eskom!!!!
complaint.suggestion: Improve customer service by reducing wait times, providing effective call backs, and addressing the issue of not being able to use data. Consider offering options to speak to a live person instead of relying solely on automated services.
